name: Simple Privacy
author: SideCar Apps

sections.description:
This will protect the user or admin facing wordpress pages. Separate login and passwords can be setup for each.

This isn’t anything fancy, not super secure, just basic and easy. It is called simple after all.
sections.faq:
How secure is this?

It works, beyond that no promises here. Feel free to let me know if you have ideas for making it more secure.
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Removed two realms so now it only prompts for pw once where it would prompt twice for admins in certain pages before.

1.1

  • Bug fixes to be compatible with latest WordPress

1.0

  • First release

short_description: A simple way to create a private Wordpress blog with htauth.
description:
This will protect the user or admin facing wordpress pages. Separate login and passwords can be setup for each.

This isn’t anything fancy, not super secure, just basic and easy. It is called simple after all.
